definition: (of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
parents-in-law of one's offspring

sentences.english: Long to set out the next day, but the wangs are closed.
sentences.chinese: 第二天长文来迎亲，但王家大门紧闭。

sentences.english: When the time came to build Zhang escort, Yin jooping home bride suddenly disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 当建璋前来迎亲的时候，尹家的新娘却突然消失了。

definition: to take a wife
bridal sedan chair
see 新娘[xin1 niang2]
palanquin with eight carriers/(fig.) lavish treatment
wedding car/carriage for collecting the bride
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
to marry off a daughter
first return of bride to her parental home
bridegroom/groom
ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地
to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
marriage by capture/bride kidnapping
ceremonial weaponry
to attend a funeral/to take part in a funeral procession
man's family (in marriage)
attendant of the bride or bridegroom at a wedding
